creator: Bigcool Games
descriptionHtml:
Fruit Diary 2: Manor Design is a brand new match 3 puzzle game for free.

Blast the fruits, solve matching puzzles, renovate and decorate a huge manor! Enjoy hundreds of fun and addicting puzzles without wifi! Start your exciting adventure now!

Match 3 and more fruits to create explosive combos and beat levels! Renovate and decorate rooms in the home, receive rewards for completing rooms and discover more hidden areas! Why not take a break, and dive into a relaxing world of home design?

FEATURES

• Home Design Game
Decorate your home and change its indoor design by swapping and matching juicy fruits!

• Solve Match 3 Puzzles
Hundreds of unique match 3 puzzles filled with tons of fun, various fruit elements and incredible boosters!

• Lots of Amazing Rewards
Complete each room’s design to earn sweet free rewards including coins, boosters and so on!

• Regular Events
Participate in regular special events to collect loads of coins and special treasures!

• Explore Different Areas
New rooms, swimming pool, fascinating garden, and more mysterious areas await you in the manor!

• A Cute Pet
A loyal fluffy dog is always there to accompany you!

Fruit Diary 2: Manor Design is a free offline game, combining home decor, renovation, house design and classic fruit matching puzzles. Any questions? Contact us at fruitdiary2@bigcool.com. We value your feedback!

Your home is ready for its makeovers! Try it now and create the most amazing manor ever!
descriptionShort: Design a splendid home by solving match 3 puzzles! No wifi needed!

Fruit Diary 2: Manor Design is a brand new match 3 puzzle game for free.

Blast the fruits, solve matching puzzles, renovate and decorate a huge manor! Enjoy hundreds of fun and addicting puzzles without wifi! Start your exciting adventure now!

Match 3 and more fruits to create explosive combos and beat levels! Renovate and decorate rooms in the home, receive rewards for completing rooms and discover more hidden areas! Why not take a break, and dive into a relaxing world of home design?

FEATURES

• Home Design Game
Decorate your home and change its indoor design by swapping and matching juicy fruits!

• Solve Match 3 Puzzles
Hundreds of unique match 3 puzzles filled with tons of fun, various fruit elements and incredible boosters!

• Lots of Amazing Rewards
Complete each room’s design to earn sweet free rewards including coins, boosters and so on!

• Regular Events
Participate in regular special events to collect loads of coins and special treasures!

• Explore Different Areas
New rooms, swimming pool, fascinating garden, and more mysterious areas await you in the manor!

• A Cute Pet
A loyal fluffy dog is always there to accompany you!

Fruit Diary 2: Manor Design is a free offline game, combining home decor, renovation, house design and classic fruit matching puzzles. Any questions? Contact us at fruitdiary2@bigcool.com. We value your feedback!

Your home is ready for its makeovers! Try it now and create the most amazing manor ever!

container.value: Room 721, 7th Floor, Building 2, Huajiang Paradise Walk Business Center, No.1001 Yuhangtang Road, Xihu District, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China

creator: Bigcool Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Fruit Diary 2: Match 3 & Home, where a fruit-tastic adventure awaits! Brace yourself for a thrilling combination of match 3 puzzles and home design games offline!

Match 3 and blast juicy fruits, solve matching puzzles, renovate and decorate a huge manor! Enjoy hundreds of fun and relaxing puzzles without wifi! Dozens of hidden areas are waiting for you to discover! Why not take a break, and dive into a relaxing world of home design games offline?

FEATURES

• Experience a unique twist on match 3 games
Test your matching skills in captivating match 3 puzzles. Match as many fruits as possible, achieving a score that’ll have your friends envious!

• Decorate and renovate a variety of houses
Earn stars by completing match 3 levels and unlock stunning houses with multiple rooms. It's like playing both a fun matching game and a home design game offline at once!

• Power up your gameplay with incredible boosters
A mega matching that clears the board or a booster that reshuffles all the fruits at once? Use them skillfully to conquer levels like a match 3 game champion!

• Immerse yourself in the fun of home design games offline
Fruit Diary 2: Match 3 & Home is an offline match 3 game. You can play it anytime, anywhere with no wifi or internet connection. Carry the excitement of a fruit-filled mini arcade wherever you go! Fun but no wifi required!

• Engage in regular events and unlock amazing bonus
Participate in events and challenges to showcase your puzzle-solving talents. Try to win all the fantastic rewards and exclusive items!

Don't miss out on this fun free match 3 game with all the trimmings! Fruit Diary 2: Match 3 & Home is a cool fusion of home design, renovation game and classic fruit matching puzzles. Not only will you relish challenging match 3 games, but you'll also unleash your inner interior designer in the home design game.

Any questions? Contact us at fruitdiary2@bigcool.com. We value your feedback!

What are you waiting for? Dive in, match 3 fruits, and let the fun bloom!

Not only will you relish challenging match 3 games, but you'll also unleash your inner interior designer in the home design game.

Any questions? Contact us at fruitdiary2@bigcool.com. We value your feedback!

What are you waiting for? Dive in, match 3 fruits, and let the fun bloom!
